## Description
What was the prompt that initiated this work?

## Response Summary
What was the key outcome of the response?

## Files Modified
List the files that were created or modified.

## Tests Added/Run
What tests were added or executed?

- Related Plan: 
- Related Task: 

## Stage
What stage does this record belong to? (constitution | spec | plan | tasks | red | green | refactor | explainer | misc | general)
